userInterface

Class LevelSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • userInterface.LevelSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Learn

    public class LevelSelection
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Virtual Optics

    Class extends JPanel class from java and represents a panel where the user can select a level according to his current progress and will send him to the level he has chosen.

    Author:
    Darrin Fong, Tieme Togola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
